description: Explainable Machine Learning Framework for Credit Risk Assessment
Core functionality for the MLJ machine learning framework

E2E (Easy to Ensemble) is a novel R package designed to provide a comprehensive and flexible framework for ensemble machine learning, specifically tailored for medical applications like diagnosis and prognosis.
A framework for developing multi-scale arrays for use in scientific machine learning (SciML) simulations

Developed a prognostic framework leveraging machine learning algorithms for early and accurate prediction of multiple diseases. The model integrates patient health data and clinical parameters to enhance diagnostic precision and support preventive healthcare decisions.
A communication framework between client applications and machine learning models
MORSE (Model Optimization tools for Remote Sensing Data Analysis) is a Python-based framework for optimising machine learning models for multi-modal remote sensing data.

This project presents an AI-Driven IoT Framework designed to automate the process of fruit detection, ripeness classification, and autonomous plucking in modern smart farms. By integrating computer vision, machine learning, robotic control, and IoT connectivity, the system aims to improve harvesting efficiency, reduce labor dependency.

A comprehensive educational repository featuring "from-scratch" implementations of fundamental machine learning, deep learning, and reinforcement learning algorithms in Python, designed to illustrate the mathematical core of models without reliance on high-level frameworks.

This project presents an AI-driven cloud security auditing platform that automatically collects AWS configuration data, detects misconfigurations, evaluates risk using machine learning, maps violations to compliance frameworks, and visualizes attack paths through interactive 3D attack graphs, supported by reports and a live dashboard.
This repository contains the codes for the paper: "A thermoinformational framework for the description of neuropsychological systems through machine learning "

Machine learning framework to detect and forecast unwind risk in the USD/JPY carry trade. The project includes a full data ingestion pipeline (FX, rates, volatility, risk indices), custom labels for unwind episodes, feature engineering, expanding-window cross-validation, and an out-of-sample trading strategy with risk-filtered carry returns.

CryptoMarket Regime Classifier is a machine learning framework that detects market regimes (Trend, Range, Squeeze, etc.) in crypto markets using multi-timeframe data and Hidden Markov Models. The project provides plug-and-play labeled datasets and trained models (HMM + LSTM) for downstream strategy development, position sizing, and risk management.
Machine Learning Pipeline Frameworks to Predict Directional Anisotropic Permeabilities From Porous Media Image

This project presents a data-driven framework designed to optimise healthcare resource allocation across Chinese prefecture-level cities using advanced predictive analytics and machine learning techniques. Healthcare resource allocation has become increasingly complex due to growing populations, regional inequalities, and dynamic healthcare demands
A minimal library for accessible Machine Learning workflows within the KDD framework. You can use a MLwrap tutorial at: https://psyarxiv.com/j6m4z

A comprehensive platform for building, training, and deploying intelligent NLU chatbots powered by advanced Machine Learning algorithms and the RASA framework. Features a Next.js frontend and a Python dual-mode backend
A framework for wrapping Machine Learning projects with rest API
An evaluation framework for machine learning models simulating high-throughput materials discovery.

This repository explores Machine Learning through projects, scripts, and tutorials. It covers data preprocessing, model training, evaluation, and deployment using frameworks like scikit-learn, TensorFlow, and PyTorch, with applications in classification, regression, NLP, and computer vision.
Minerva is a framework for training machine learning models for researchers.
A machine learning-based video super resolution and frame interpolation framework. Est. Hack the Valley II, 2018.
The Unified Disease Prediction System is a streamlined machine learning-based framework designed to predict Heart Disease, Parkinsons Disease, and Diabetes through a single, user-friendly interface.
Open-source machine learning framework for Java. Designed with speed and lightweight in mind.

Machine Learning framework for PWR abnormality detection using an optimized Random Forest model with SMOTE balancing and Grid Search tuning. Includes full evaluation, ROC-AUC, confusion matrix, feature importance, and reproducible code from the research publication.

A machine learning framework that predicts book popularity ratings by extracting sentiment and emotional features from narrative   text. Uses NLP techniques (VADER sentiment analysis, NRC emotion lexicon) combined with RNN/LSTM models to analyze 1,160+ Project   Gutenberg eBooks and predict Goodreads ratings
A machine learning framework template project for SUFE HPC.
This repository includes all the code developed during my in-depth exploration of machine learning and deep learning frameworks.
Adaptive Threat Hunting: A Machine Learning-Based Real-Time Network Anomaly Detection System

Tywra ML is a front-end machine learning website built using the React.js library and the Next.js framework. This website was created as a simple project while also continuing advanced learning of JavaScript.

modular template for building Zero-Knowledge Machine Learning systems  ZKML Blueprint is an open-source framework designed to help developers, researchers, and builders create verifiable machine learning systems using zero-knowledge proofs. It provides a structured reference architecture, example circuits, model workflows, and tools for integrating

Neuralisp is a modular machine learning framework for Common Lisp, focused on deep learning models. It offers a high-performance tensor library, various neural network layers, activation functions, optimizers, and loss functions. Designed for rapid model creation, training, and testing across diverse tasks.

A machine learning project to predict and classify high-risk drug interactions for enhanced pharmaceutical safety. The model provides a technical framework for drug risk assessment by utilizing features like salt composition, side effects, and drug descriptions.
This repository is to test popular machine learning and deep learning frameworks
Interpretable Machine and Deep Learning Framework for Tea Leaf Disease Detection

A knowledge repository of advanced AI concepts and agent frameworks, featuring expert-level markdown guides on machine learning, deep learning, NLP/LLM, and multi-agent system design patterns. Ideal for researchers, developers, and teams building robust, scalable AI solutions.
Developed a comprehensive weather pattern analysis framework by integrating machine learning models with geospatia
A from-scratch implementation of a feedforward neural network in C# (.NET 8) without using any machine learning frameworks.
Open Machine Learning Framework in CPP

SMILE is a featurebased machine learning classification framework for eventinterval sequence data. While its primary application is medical diagnostics using Electronic Health Record data, the framework is generalisable to domains such as human activity recognition, music classification, and manufacturing telemetry.

A fast, distributed, high performance gradient boosting (GBT, GBDT, GBRT, GBM or MART) framework based on decision tree algorithms, used for ranking, classification and many other machine learning tasks.

This project demonstrates a quantum machine learning classification using Qiskit framework. Specifically, it builds quantum support vector machine (QSVM) models on classical datasets (e.g., breast cancer and heart disease) and explores quantum kernels and variational quantum classifiers (VQC) to classify data into distinct classes.

This project builds an AI-powered system that predicts employee burnout risk, explains key contributing factors, and provides actionable workload optimization strategies. It combines machine learning, explainable AI (XAI), and optimization algorithms to help organizations maintain workforce health and productivity.

PiXie Ops - Lightweight devops framework on top of Kubernetes & Terraform (OpenTofu) which simplifies cloud-native deployment to the same complexity level as Docker Compose. Ideal for demo's and proof-of-concepts in AI, machine learning pipelines and RAG. Works locally on Kind and in cloud on Azure via push. Can pull images, but does not do CI/CD

CRISP-JR is a comprehensive framework for analyzing fairness, efficiency, and transparency in judicial systems. Built upon CRISP-DM methodology, it integrates process mining, statistical analysis, machine learning, and domain-specific adaptations for legal contexts.
GoMLX: An Accelerated Machine Learning Framework For Go
A Machine Learning Framework for Comprehensive Classification of Plant Transcription Factors

LEO CDP is an open-source, AI-first Customer Data Platform for building customizable, self-hosted, privacy-friendly CDP infrastructure. It unifies data collection, enables real-time analytics, audience segmentation, and personalized marketing  powered by big data and machine learning.
A twolayer security framework is proposed for Internet of Vehicles (IoV) environments that combines lightweight cryptography with a machine learningbased Network Intrusion Detection System (NIDS).

A modular, accelerator-ready machine learning framework built in Go that speaks float8/16/32/64. Designed with clean architecture, strong typing, and native concurrency for scalable, production-ready AI systems. Ideal for engineers who value simplicity, speed, and maintainability.
An open-source machine learning framework for global analyses of parton distributions.

A quantitative framework for analyzing bilingual speech production through the lens of the Speech Learning Model-Revised (SLM-r). This repository implements a machine learning-driven pipeline that operationalizes theoretical predictions from Flege & Bohn's (2021) SLM-r into testable statistical hypotheses. A product of sleep deprivation.
Enterprise graph machine learning framework for billion-scale graphs for ML scientists and data scientists.
A lightweight, feature-engineered machine learning framework (FEIIDS) for real-time IoT intrusion detection, ensuring high accuracy and low computational cost.
Automated modeling and machine learning framework FEDOT

A hybrid modelling framework for carbon emission forecasting integrating system identification (AR/ARX models), deterministic trend decomposition, and machine-learning residual learning. Includes data preprocessing, regional CO analysis, rolling out-of-sample forecasting, and cross-continental model comparison.

SafeNet Ecosystem is an advanced, cross-platform phishing detection framework powered by modern AI models. It is designed to protect users across web, desktop, and mobile environments by identifying suspicious URLs, emails, messages, and app activities in real time.  Built with a modular architecture, SafeNet combines machine learning, rule-based s
an open source differential machine learning asset pricing framework
A performant and dynamic MachineLearning framework written in .NET

MAPRL (Multiagent Planning for Reinforcement Learning) is a framework that integrates Reward Machines (RMs) with Partial-Order Planning (POP) to enhance coordination in multi-agent reinforcement learning (MARL).
A reproducible machine learning framework for short-term radon activity concentration forecasting in the Campi Flegrei volcanic area

A compact framework exploring distributed machine learning across data-parallel ML, model-parallel ML, hybrid parallel strategies, and federated learning. This repo provides modular examples of multi-node training, gradient synchronization, secure aggregation, and scalable distributed experiments.

A real-time Digital Twin framework for Predictive Maintenance (PdM) of rotating machinery. Uses MQTT for live sensor data streaming, Streamlit for dashboard visualization, and Machine Learning models (Random Forest/LSTM) to predict Remaining Useful Life (RUL) and detect anomalies.
Data and Codes for Integrated Design Framework for Titanium Aluminides Through Interpretable Machine Learning

Machine learning framework predicting U.S. county-level opioid cost per capita (20132023) by integrating Pharmacy Benefit Management (PBM) levers and Social Determinants of Health (SDOH). Includes data pipelines, simulation code, and reproducible figures.

Stat/ML framework for optimizing Laser Powder Bed Fusion (LPBF) manufacturing parameters  minimizes scrap and maximizes throughput through statistical inference, machine learning, and interactive visualization.
Machine learning of metal-organic framework design for band gap energy prediction

Developed an explainable AI framework integrating machine learning for accurate brain tumor MRI classification. Enhanced model transparency through interpretability techniques, enabling clinicians to understand decision logic and improve diagnostic reliability in medical image analysis.
A comprehensive testing suite for validating ROCm (Radeon Open Compute) functionality with Python machine learning frameworks and libraries.
An Open Source Machine Learning Framework for Everyone
Building machine learning algorithms from the ground up using Python. No frameworksjust pure implementations to understand the fundamentals.

Build a credit risk prediction model and apply SHAP and LIME to explain global and local decisions. Compare both methods, analyze discrepancies, and produce an interpretable, regulator-friendly explanation framework for fair and transparent loan approvals.
Code of the publication: Integrated Genome-Wide Association Study and Machine Learning Approach For Characterization of Biofilm Formation Determinants in Staphylococcus aureus
Machine-learning meta-labeling framework using Random Forest and XGBoost to filter technical trading signals based on market regimes.

A modular ECG signal analysis framework designed for reproducible research and machine learning applications. The pipeline integrates classical signal-processing workflows with delineation tools and beat-level feature extraction, enabling high-resolution physiological analysis.

Geospatial Machine Learning Framework for Maritime Anomaly Detection and Illegal Fishing Prevention
Code for the machine learning and explainable AI framework for financial statement fraud detection (Mongolian dataset).

Data for the paper "A Machine Learning Framework for Harvesting and Harmonizing Cultural and Touristic Data", published in the "Information" Journal/MDPI

Open source web based machine learning framework for MCUs
a hybrid graphspectral machine-learning framework to predict triplet lifetimes

Machine learning framework written in C.

A machine learning model to predict loan default risk based on  customer financial and credit features. It uses LightGBM, a powerful gradient boosting  framework, combined with feature engineering, cross-validation, and scaling techniques to  ensure robust and generalizable results.

Movie Rating Prediction   Built a machine learning model to predict how users might rate movies they havent watched yet.  Cleaned and preprocessed the rating dataset for accuracy and consistency.  Applied collaborative filtering and regression techniques to generate predictions.  Evaluated model performance using RMSE and improved results.

A machine learning framework analyzing transportation policy impacts on urban congestion in the Philippines using Temporal Fusion Transformer models and causal inference. Features an interactive dashboard for policy simulation and includes 7,430+ observations from 12 data sources.

Collection of projects applying data science and quantitative finance techniques  from portfolio optimization and CAPM estimation to machine learning and ESG event analysis  to explore real-world financial datasets and decision-making frameworks.
Hybrid Machine Learning and Partial Differential Equation Framework for Modern Option Pricing
lamp++ fast and lightweight machine learning framework in cpp, supporting tensors and autograd. includes implementations of basic neural networks

This project builds a machine-learningdriven decision engine that detects fraudulent financial transactions and quantifies its business impact. It forms the foundation of a scalable risk intelligence framework.
A collection of AI-driven applications and experiments built using Next.js, Python  and  machine learning frameworks

Capstone project for the Imperial College London AI & Machine Learning Certificate, showcasing end-to-end ML development  from data preparation to model training, evaluation, and insights using Python and modern ML frameworks.
Framework, toolkit and ready-to-use applications for numerical linear algebra dependent machine learning algorithms.
This repo contain the jupyter scripts for  files of scikitlearn, tensorflow and keras
A hybrid optimization framework that integrates machine learning and optimization algorithms to improve couriertask allocation and routing efficiency in real-world conditions

A machine learning framework using Logistic Regression, Random Forest, and XGBoost to detect credit card fraud in real time. Built on the Kaggle dataset, it delivers scalable, explainable, and business-ready risk scoring for banks and financial institutions.
